result.title: Getting Time limit exceededation on test 38. Problem No- 876B — Divisiblity of Differences
result.content:
I was getting time limit exceedation on test case 4 in the same problem . I solved that problem and found that there was problem with loops. The complexity was O(n square) and also many statements on there. I was successful to shorten them and successfully passed on test case 4. But now the problem is with test case 38.

Given the submission ID and source code ID here if anyone may help me.

31697487

include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

long long int difference(int num1,int num2);

int main()

{ int n,k,m,i,p,j,cnt,diff; long long int arr[100010],store[100010];

scanf("%d %d %d",&n,&k,&m);

for(i=0; i<n; i++)
{
    scanf("%ld",&arr[i]);
}

for(i=0; i<n; i++)
{
    p=0;
    cnt=1;
    for(j=i+1; j<n; j++)
    {
        diff=difference(arr[i],arr[j]);
        if(diff%m==0 )
        {
            cnt++;
            store[p]=arr[j];
            if (cnt==k) break;
            p++;
        }

    }
    if (cnt==k) break;
}

if(k!=cnt) printf("No\n");

else if(k==cnt)
{
    printf("Yes\n");
    printf("%d ",arr[i]);
    for(p=0; p<k-1; p++)
        printf("%d ",store[p]);
}
printf("\n");

return 0;

}

long long int difference(int num1,int num2)

{ int diff; diff=num1-num2; if(diff>=0) return diff; else return (-1*diff); }
